// Pivot 0, 0
int Flipper_der[22] = {
	66, 15,
	61, 24,
	52, 25,
	48, 22,
	30, 23,
	5, 20,
	0, 13,
	16, 7,
	29, 6,
	55, 3,
	65, 8
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float Flipper_der[22] = {
	0.985075f, 0.555556f,
	0.910448f, 0.888889f,
	0.776119f, 0.925926f,
